scripts.postinstall: cd shared && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../client && yarn install
scripts.start: concurrently -n "shared,client" "cd shared && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.build: cd shared && yarn build && cd ../client && yarn build
scripts.clean-dist: concurrently -n "shared,client" "cd shared && yarn clean-dist" "cd client && yarn clean-dist"
scripts.clean-node: concurrently -n "shared,client" "cd shared && yarn clean-node" "cd client && yarn clean-node"
